page.title: 16Stevensons
page.content: Stevensons was founded by the Stevenson family, originally as a laundry and then turned to dyeing articles for people. It is now no longer a family firm, but part of the Nottingham manufacturing group, a major supplier of sock, hosiery and knitwear for chain stores. They dye socks, stockings and garments in all types of material such as Wool, Cotton, Nylon, polyester as well as silk. They also dye yarn for carpets and all forms of knitwear. 1150 people are employed. It is 24 hour service. Approx 1,5000,020 gallons of water are used a day for dyeing articles. They dye materials and export all over the world including India, China and Japan. {
